scripts.dist:linux: pkg package.json --no-bytecode --public --public-packages '*' --target linux --output dist/cic && pushd dist && sha256sum cic > cic.sha256sum && popd
scripts.dist:macos: pkg package.json --no-bytecode --public --public-packages '*' --target macos --output dist/cic-macos && pushd dist && sha256sum cic-macos > cic-macos.sha256sum && popd
scripts.dist:win: pkg package.json --no-bytecode --public --public-packages '*' --target win --output dist/cic-win.exe && pushd dist && sha256sum cic-win.exe > cic-win.exe.sha256sum && popd
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build && npm run test
